title: Here and now
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Human Services, funding
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
description: Depression can be a disability making every day seemingly a challenge just to get through to the next day. Brendan, with help and motivation, has overcome his struggle with depression and is enjoying the here and now - working, new friends and generally feeling good about himself. "Ode to Barry" written and performed by Brendan Forde. This project was funded by the Department of Human Services, (Eastern Metropolitan Region), developed and executed in partnership with MetroAccess at the City of Monash and City of Whitehorse, and Scope.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000820; Untold stories of civic participation; Active; 2006
